channel.title: macos on Jesstern
channel.description: Recent content in macos on Jesstern

item.title: Repeating keys stopped working in macOS
item.description: I’m not sure why this happened, but at some point I lost the ability to hold down on a key to repeat them. To solve this, run the following command in a terminal. You may need to restart the terminal for it to work. defaults write -g ApplePressAndHoldEnabled -bool false
